google_translated: I also want to be Kana ...

en_text: I really wish I could've died on the Earth I grew up on.
jp_text:
自分の生まれた地球の上で
死にたかったな
google_translated:
On the earth's birth
I wanted to die

en_text: I'm sorry, Onii-chan.
jp_text: ごめんね お兄ちゃん
google_translated: Sorry I'm sorry

en_text: If only I could've been stronger, like Kana-chan...
jp_text: 強くなれたらよかったのにね
google_translated: I wish I could get stronger

en_text: That way... even you, Onii-chan...
jp_text: そうすれば お兄ちゃんだって…
google_translated: If you do so, you're an older brother ...

en_text: To all of my friends who fought through all the suffering...
jp_text:
（カナ）
苦しみ抜いて戦った仲間たち
google_translated: Friends who got out of suffering and fighting

en_text: Thank you
jp_text: ありがとう　私は忘れません
google_translated: Thank you I will not forget

en_text: Next time on Bokurano, the final episode: The story.
jp_text: 「ぼくらの」 最終回 “物語”
google_translated: "Bokura" final round "story"
